body: This is a regression introduced by dfe82dc93ab9 (not actually caused by MulliganScreen). It also prevents -DtestGame=X from working. Need to be more selective in determining whether container JPanel is visible or not.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: GamePanel not shown if MulliganScreen option is disabled.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on February 06, 2014 03:31:12_

This is a regression introduced by dfe82dc93ab9 (not actually caused by MulliganScreen). It also prevents -DtestGame=X from working. Need to be more selective in determining whether container JPanel is visible or not.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=477_
